website_summaries.verdict: A neat concept that's ideal for displaying small items such as jewelry and crafts; but it's only going to appeal to consumers with specific needs.
pros: A revolving model with 4 sides that fits nicely on counters and tabletops
Easy to put together, and offers stable plastic construction
cons: A bit pricey, considering it has limited uses and isn't practical for storage

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love my stand and will probably get another! It is a bit tricky to snap together, but once it’s together it’s awesome! Spins easily and very sturdy for jewelry display. I ordered 50 piece peg set and it was not enough! So I ordered more!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa English

customer_reviews.title: JUST what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I had a request to enter a dog rescue event as a vendor. I make dog key fobs and pillows, but was never a vendor at a show. So I needed a quick display. Got this fast in the mail and tossed it together to hold my key fobs. Worked out GREAT. I'll be purchasing another couple in the near future so I'll be ready for other vendor/craft shows in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dian Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this hoping for a lightweight travel display for my small items. I sell primarily at swap meets and flea markets, so weight and size are my biggest concerns. This display is on the large size of things, but it's easily made up for by the awesome amount of display space it provides. I easily fit 24 pegs with various items on it and still had room to spare!! Plus it looks nice, customers were drawn to it, and it's very lightweight. The only drawback that I can think of is that once assembled it cannot be broken back down. All in all, I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Customizable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pegs and the rotating display for a friend to use for her Scentsy display at a recent event— she LOVES it! The pegs hold her product nicely and are easy to customize in terms of placement on the display itself. She recommends both pegs and rotating display for anyone who needs to showcase their products in a stylish and professional way!
customer_reviews.author: Pier

customer_reviews.title: Easy to see color combinations
customer_reviews.text: I make jewelry and this is the perfect way to display my inventory by color!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Seifers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in perfect condition, easy to put together and is perfect! I was looking for something a little bigger I could use at events and this will take up way less table space vs my previous set up. I like that you cannot take it apart after assembling, it is solid. I was a little worried of the condition it would arrive in due to previous comments but it arrived fine. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Dono

customer_reviews.title: but it ensures it'll be quite sturdy. My one concern is that it's a permanent ...
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a little tricky, but it ensures it'll be quite sturdy. My one concern is that it's a permanent assembly, so you can't use the inside for storage or clean out dust and bugs that get in there over time. However, I've left the top off and secured the top corners with zip ties, and it works just fine. I think with some good snips to the tabs I can make the top removable. I loved this, my staff loved it, customers loved it, and I want another. If they come in twice the height, I will buy one!
customer_reviews.author: B. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: ALMOST Perfect...
customer_reviews.text: I love this display! It's exactly what I needed, and super sturdy. The almond color is great. My ONLY criticism is that once assembled it really can't be easily or safely disassembled for transport. So that's less than ideal for using at markets and fairs. But it's ok, it's worth a (slightly bulky) place in my vehicle, even so. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jayar123

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and swivels with ease.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to Display Handmade Leather Earrings. A bit difficult to assemble by yourself. Love how lightweight it is which compromises some of the sturdiness but overall a great product if you are looking for a lighter display. I used PegPro 2” straight hooks which are perfect for this display.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The pegboard was hard for me to assemble but a 23 year old put it together in a flash. It worked exceptional on my table. It was too heavy for me. It was too big for my table. I highly recommend this product. I also have a smaller one and its amazing. Don't be afraud to try these products.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Inez Cain

customer_reviews.title: Pain to put together, but works great!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a big pain to get together. However now that it’s together it works perfect for my craft shows as a table top display when I don’t have the floor space to bring in my big displays.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was hard which is the reason for the 4 stars.! I wouldn’t have been able to put it together without my husbands help. It seemed like it was going to break when putting on the bottom and top pieces! He finally got it snapped together and I will now have a nice little display stand for my shop.
customer_reviews.author: kristal

customer_reviews.title: Works great looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pegboard! It spins very easily and is super lightweight. It was easy to assemble. I can fit a lot more jewelry on it than I thought I would have been able to!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little flimsy but durable enough. Swivels nicely. There is room for 140 hooks spaced appropriately for earrings on tags. Once put together it looks professional.
customer_reviews.author: 77mama77

customer_reviews.title: Horribly hard to snap together
customer_reviews.text: This products instructions were unclear it took a tremendous amount of pressure to put together as well and snap together the tabs almost seemed to not want to be put together at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wingfield

customer_reviews.title: Nice display.
customer_reviews.text: Nice way to display for shows. Was concerned it would break during assembly, but it withstood pressure. Like turntable function. Looks classier than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a embroidery machine and was looking for a way to organize my thread. This rack works perfectly without having to dedicate a wall for a peg board. With this small footprint I am able to get 70 spools of thread on each side. I used these for the pegs
customer_reviews.author: Tracie Rainey

customer_reviews.title: Revolving Pegboard
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome product. I started out with one and bought another one. It's absolutely wonderful and a beautiful asset to my jewelry business.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Paparazzi jewelry!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as described and it works soooo perfect for my Paparazzi jewelry!! You don't need any tools to put together either!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Slankard

customer_reviews.title: Nice jewelry display!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice piece to display jewelry. The yellow color is fresh and clean! I can put 35 pairs of earrings on each side, for a total of 140 displayed earrings. You can actually store more than that because you can stack the earrings 3-4 deep on each hook. The ONLY down side is that the unit can’t be taken apart for traveling. But because of its permanent nature, it’s very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BetsyLulu

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to put together! I painted it to match my business colors, it is very sturdy and looks great with my products
customer_reviews.author: Rudisilly34

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Craft Shows!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this pegboard display after reading reviews and asking questions from fellow buyers. Overall, everyone was pleased with this, however there was a mention about some small pieces had broke. I too, had two small snap in pieces break, but I was still able to connect all pieces in place with no issues. I am planning on ordering another one for my craft shows, for they hold a lot of merchandise making the displays shopable and not cluttered!
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waist your money.
customer_reviews.text: Very poorly designed. Does not go together very well at all. The clips don’t line up. Don’t waist your money.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Cannot be disassembled once assembled
customer_reviews.text: Also there is no access to the internal space for storage. Otherwise, they are durable, lightweight, and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: J Minstersquiggly

customer_reviews.title: Ok rack
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like that you can’t collapse it for transport. Once it is assembled you can’t disassemble it. It does take more space in my car than I expected. I also don’t like that the hooks are sold separately. It is sturdy enough for my products and swivels/spins smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: TMS

customer_reviews.title: Light weight works great!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to put together. It doesn’t snap as easily as I would have thought. Be once I got it together it worked great. My ornaments looks awesome on it!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Vibbard

customer_reviews.title: My only regret is not purchasing this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I love this. I’m a 54 year old female who was able to assemble this in about 15 minutes - the key is to line up all for sides before trying to connect the top and bottom pieces. It’s light weight but very sturdy and has a nice amount of space to display all my jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: becky fawley

customer_reviews.title: A must have if you are a Paparazzi Consultant
customer_reviews.text: I am a Paparazzi Independent Consultant and I have been looking for something like this...They are awesome! They look great, are light weight for vendor shows and hold a ton of earrings! I’ve ordered 3 more because you can stack them—
customer_reviews.author: melinda

customer_reviews.title: Love this. I have 3.
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 of these. They're not too hard to put together- just tales a little finessing- and have held up really well. I use them for displaying product at indoor and outdoor shows and they survived being blown off the table at a crazy winded Kansas show! I am able to stack one on top of the other on a standard height table and people can still shop from them. I use about 100 2 inch metal hooks on each rack.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA OLEARY

customer_reviews.title: Bad deal!
customer_reviews.text: Received broken. Appeared to have been already returned by Kohl’s Department Store. Bad deal!
customer_reviews.author: Tee Juneau

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is a lot bigger than I expected bit I'm not complaining. It's exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: NikeshaJ

customer_reviews.title: Worked as planned. You have to put it together ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked as planned. You have to put it together; but not that hard if I can do it!
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Came in handy for a market i was at. The instructions also note, you cannot detach once it’s put together. Make your decision wisely.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Walker

customer_reviews.title: Assembly is difficult but overall a great
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to put together but it is sturdy and is holding up well. I didn't read the description very well and didn't notice the dimensions. It had a lot more girth than I realized upon ordering. Overall it's about 3 ft wide. However, I am very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Very useful in my small business. Clients have loved it since i purchased it
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to snap together
customer_reviews.text: I like the finished product and works well to display product, but is heavy to carry and difficult to snap together.
customer_reviews.author: Bookfiend

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: a great product. i had no problem assembling. put it together by myself if about 10 minutes. very sturdy for my sewing supplies
customer_reviews.author: alfalfajean

customer_reviews.title: Unlike the TARDIS, this is much bigger on the outside
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, and very nice looking. However, it was much larger than I thought it was going to be. I purchased it to display some items on the front desk in my office, and it kind of took over the area. I ended up disassembling it, and just mounting the side panels to the wall. It's not the product's fault, it just should have been more clear in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa McGowan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this ... makes organizing beads, etc. an easy thing.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: It is alot bigger then I thought it would be and definitely worth the money! It did give me some trouble to put the top on cause it snaps funny. Just an FYI the instructions state once its assembled it cannot be taken apart not sure how true but just wanted to share that
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this display to use at craft shows to display gloves. The display works great, and I'm very happy with how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great. But bulky
customer_reviews.text: This rotates smoothly and is lightweight. It’s very very very wide. So takes a lot of trunk space back and forth to shows. But makes things look clean.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is sturdy and bigger than I thought. I had a hard time putting it together but had help.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany-Rae

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken and hard to assemble and unable to return
customer_reviews.text: It arrived broken so I tried to return it and the email from the company that I was supposed to print the label from wouldn’t work since now I have a broken/damaged product that I can’t even use it return.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Santiago

customer_reviews.title: You spin mme round, round baby
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. The packaging was GREAT! Maybe they improved it from the other reviews I read. All the pieces came in tact and it is really easy to put together. It was perfect for our use.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: It is so easy to assemble and light weight yet sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I use it for vendor events and it holds my kids and hair accessories. 🥰 I painted it hot pink to match my business.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs baker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my jewelry needs
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to put together and I'm a little disappointed it doesn't break down for easy transportation, but it's perfect for my jewelry needs. The entire display revolves very smoothly and it fits a good 64+ pieces of jewelry!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I need to return this item. How did you ship me a plastic item and 2 parts of it is Broken... I want to buy another because I would LOVE the item. It is easy to assemble and would be great for its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lucille Barker

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea poor Execution
customer_reviews.text: Once you get it together its a nice little display. However, the plastic is too cheap. I received the first one and sent the it back with broken plastic connecting tabs right out of the box. The second one also had broken tabs but super glue worked good on this plastic. The top has a concave to the center which makes the sign holder difficult to attach. Come on Azar step up the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jolene Heit

customer_reviews.title: revolving display
customer_reviews.text: love love love it!!!!! sooooo perfect for displaying my earrings! will have to order another one
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Heartman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for table top displays
customer_reviews.text: Works very well for display. I’m pleased and may order more.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Durable, looks awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I wanted something easy to transport and concierge for my Nail Strip business! I ended up ordering two! Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Shera

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, works great for my shop to display merchandise. Worth it!
customer_reviews.author: David Lejbowicz

customer_reviews.title: How my spinner is doing
customer_reviews.text: Don't have a pic but I decorated it and my customers love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Best

customer_reviews.title: This stand looks and works great. I would give it five stars if it ...
customer_reviews.text: This stand looks and works great. I would give it five stars if it were easier to set up. I felt like I was going to break the plastic with every piece I snapped together.
customer_reviews.author: dsfisherman89

customer_reviews.title: I love the whole thing.
customer_reviews.text: Love it.. it was a little hard for me to assemble. I needed one more person to help..
customer_reviews.author: Patsy  Ann Burd

customer_reviews.title: Pegboard
customer_reviews.text: I really love this item.but it came with 1 of the snap lock broke but still stayed together great with the other 3 snap locks.other wise I would give it a 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed to display spirit sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is that is came with some of the prongs broken.
customer_reviews.author: kathleen haas

customer_reviews.title: Great display for events!
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and it was easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Baker T

customer_reviews.title: Love this spinner!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my retail shop and allows us to display a lot of jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great rotating pegboard display
customer_reviews.text: Great for displaying small items. Wish it came apart for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Boutique
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for me to display my handmade jewelry on in a small boutique.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It is very well put together and eady to move
customer_reviews.text: Earrings. Liked it a lot little difficult to put together
customer_reviews.author: Dolores Ray

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Made very well and is very useful for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Good product stable and makes the product I sell visible to the customer
customer_reviews.text: Good product stable and makes the product I sell visible to the customer
customer_reviews.author: Dallas B

customer_reviews.title: rating
customer_reviews.text: To is just what I need for my display it works great easy to move and very easy to take from one location to another
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Powers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size! A little tricky to assemble, but great quality
customer_reviews.author: Tamara T.

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: Mine was in pieces and cracked when I received it. Planning to return it and buy another however the price has increased by $20- very frustrated!
customer_reviews.author: MarcF

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: The pegboard was what I was looking for. However, it did have one broken tab. But this did not effect assembly or rigidity of product.
customer_reviews.author: RRands

customer_reviews.title: It was very nice, a little harder to assemble than I would ...
customer_reviews.text: It was very nice, a little harder to assemble than I would like. Also with no handle or strap it's hard to transport which is what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Crap item
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Does not hold items hung on it well at all. I want a full refund!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever for someone who has lots of jewelry
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever for someone who has lots of jewelry. Can hang long and short necklaces, bracelets and earrings on this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Azar Displays 701414-WHT Pegboard 4-Sided Revolving Counter Display, White Solid Color
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteThis interlocking four-sided display measures 14-Inch W by 14-Inch D by 20-Inch H and stands on a 14.5-Inch diameter revolving clear plastic base. Assembled height is 21-Inch. Sign holder strip included.
feature_bullets: Works great with Azar's line of hooks and accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars233 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
